channel.title: Map editor
channel.description:
I have to create a tank game for school and have been working on a map editor for it for the past few hours.. here's the result!
[url=https://www.mediafire.com/?incftwl4ba91rlq]Download TanksMapMaker.jar (32.96KB)[/url]
[img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/148f2ht.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi57.tinypic.com/2cffe5g.jpg[/img]
--update-- [i]25/02/2014[/i] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1kMchTW-AyM
